channel.title: Connecting to my main comp through a server running on laptop
channel.description: Ok guys what I need help with is that my laptop is really messed up. On any client and server it will just shut off after my seccond click Idk why and no one will help me .. but I will do with just playing it on my big computer witch doesnt have JDK and all that for ps through silabs client but what IP would I use to connect to my laptops connection I obviously have the same Ip as it but it wont let me connect through that?
